name: DelNorte Club Token
description: CRM Web3 platform available to partner governments and institutions. ⚙️ Real-World Integration: Signed contracts with El Salvador, Brazil, Mexico, and Honduras to automate public service portals, tokenize deeds & licenses, and digitize public legal data. ▪️Licensed for money remittance in 16 U.S. states and Brazil. ▪️4 blockchain CRM patents pending in the U.S. ▪️Fully deployed CRM system tailored to municipalities and public sector use cases.
